nodes.text: Kiri Hart is the former Vice President of Development for Lucasfilm Ltd. and Development lead of the Lucasfilm Story Group. She currently holds the role of consultant.

Kiri Hart is a California native and a graduate of Stanford University. She has worked in film for more than twenty years as a story analyst, writer, and development executive. After joining Lucasfilm Ltd., Hart helped form the Lucasfilm Story Group in 2012.
Hart is producer of the animated television series Star Wars Rebels. She also co-produced the Star Wars Anthology film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.
She is also one of the members of the Intellectual Property Development Group.
